meta.siteDescription: Free online data format converter. Convert JSON, CSV, XML, YAML, SQL, Markdown and HTML instantly.
meta.descriptionTemplate: Convert your {source} files to {target} instantly. 100% free tool, client-side processing, no data sent to server. Fast and secure.

common.pageNotFoundDesc: Sorry, this conversion doesn't exist or the URL is incorrect.

converter.securityNotice: 100% local processing - Your data never leaves your browser
converter.dragDropHint: Drag & drop a file or paste your data

home.heroDescription: Transform your JSON, CSV, XML, YAML, SQL, Markdown and HTML files instantly. 100% client-side - Your data stays private.
home.chooseConversionDesc: Click on a conversion to access the dedicated tool. All transformations are performed locally in your browser.
home.feature1Desc: Your data never leaves your browser. No upload to our servers, entirely local processing.
home.feature2Desc: Instant conversion thanks to client-side processing. No waiting, no queue.
home.feature3Desc: No file limits, no account required. Convert as much as you want, for free.

json.label: JSON
json.description: JavaScript Object Notation - Lightweight data interchange format

xml.description: eXtensible Markup Language - Structured markup format

yaml.description: YAML Ain't Markup Language - Human-readable configuration format

sql.description: Structured Query Language - INSERT statements for databases

markdown.description: Lightweight markup language for formatted text

html.label: HTML Table
html.description: HTML table markup for web display

faq.a1: Converting {source} to {target} is useful when you need to integrate data into a system that only accepts {target} format. {sourceDesc} can be transformed into {target} ({targetDesc}) for better compatibility.
faq.q2: Is my data secure during conversion?
faq.a2: Absolutely. Our converter works 100% client-side (in your browser). Your {source} data is never sent to an external server. Processing is instant and completely private.
faq.q3: What is the maximum {source} file size supported?
faq.a3: Since processing happens in your browser, the limit depends on available memory. Generally, files up to 10 MB are processed without issues. For larger files, we recommend splitting them.
faq.a4: Our tool parses your {source} file, analyzes its data structure, then generates the equivalent in {target} format. Arrays, objects, and primitive values are intelligently mapped to {target} syntax.
faq.a5: Yes! We support bidirectional conversion. Use our {target} to {source} converter for the reverse operation.

seo.introTemplate: Easily transform your {source} data ({sourceDesc}) into {target} format ({targetDesc}). Our tool works entirely in your browser to guarantee your data privacy.

footer.aboutText: Convert your data between JSON, CSV, XML, YAML, SQL, Markdown and HTML for free. Our tool works entirely in your browser to guarantee your data privacy.
footer.securityNote: 100% client-side processing - Your data never leaves your browser.
